value.name: Local council vote to ban no-knock warrants won’t end the debate over the practice
value.description: Jumeeka Reed, whose brother James Scott Reed was killed during a no-knock raid ... He is accused of shooting and killing Killeen police Detective Chuck Dinwiddie in 2014 during a no-knock raid ...

value.name: Bills by local lawmakers move through Texas Legislature
value.description: 40-year-old James Scott Reed was killed by a single bullet during a no-knock narcotics raid at his home on Feb. 27, 2019. The family alleged that at least 22 rounds were fired by Killeen Police ...

value.name: Week in review: No-knocks, Guillen, water plant, housing improvements and retirement
value.description: The Killeen City Council voted Tuesday to approve an ordinance banning the Killeen Police Department from using or participating in no-knock warrants. The decision was made by a 6-1 vote, with ...
